features: FOLD-UP DESIGN — Compact, folding design makes it portable and perfect for travel, desktop, or bedside use and easy to store.
SIMPLE CONTROLS — 2 speed settings with directable airflow to tailor your air comfort.
OPTIMUM PERFORMANCE — Utilizes Vornado signature Vortex action for optimal personal air circulation.
STYLISH DESIGN — Fun, stylish translucent blade and base will add flair and comfort to your space.
SUPERIOR SUPPORT — Backed by a 3-year hassle-free promise and supported by a customer service team based in Andover, KS.
Built to meet U. S. voltage requirements. Certified, safety-tested, and warrantied for use only in the U. S.
body.description: Product Description The Vornado FIT Personal Air Circulator is the perfect marriage of fun and function. With a small footprint, FIT can be placed on just about any small or narrow surface - a desktop, nightstand, sofa table. The bright, translucent base and blade add a fun pop of color - perfect to pep up a desk or dorm room. When storage is needed, FIT folds up and stores away with ease. Because FIT is a Vornado, expect high performance, quiet operation and a 3-year satisfaction . From the Manufacturer IMPORTANT INTERNATIONAL DISCLAIMER: This item is built to meet U.S. voltage requirements and may not function properly when used in conjunction with external devices that alter or convert voltage or frequency of electricity. Improper use or shipping the product outside the U.S. will void all warranties.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vornado FIT Personal Air Circulator The Vornado FIT Personal Circulator is the perfect marriage of fun and function. With a small footprint, FIT can be placed on just about any small or narrow surface — a desktop, nightstand, sofa table. The stylish translucent base and blade add flair — perfect to pep up a desk or dorm room. When storage is needed, the FIT folds up and stores away with ease.

Features Comfort just for you. FIT provides comfortable, compact air circulation for the space you’re in by moving all the air around you - ensuring that you’re consistently comfortable. Add flair and comfort to your space. With a small footprint, the FIT can be placed on just about any small or narrow surface — a desktop, nightstand, sofa table. Take confrol of your airflow. Control your personal air comfort through FIT's 2 speed settings and directable airflow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter uses a fan for sleeping. This is a perfect fan for small spaces and great for sleep. Many small fans aren’t loud or strong enough to help with sleep. This Vornado is great. It actually plugs into a wall outlet so gets plenty of power. So compact, lightweight but a really good blast of air and a just-right-for-sleep whirring sound. Inexpensive and very effective! Happy purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a cruise or hotel room
reviews.reviewText: I needed a fan for the white noise on my cruise ship and when I travel and stay in a hotel room. Does not really push air but gives enough noise to not be so silent and help sleep. Love that’s it’s small and fits in the suitcase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good looking and quiet
reviews.reviewText: Nice personal fan that would’ve gotten 5 stars but for two negatives. First, although the fan is billed as having two speeds, the slow speed is so slow that it might be used only for blowing out candles on a birthday cake. Maybe. Second, the “foot” on which the fan rests has a very limited range making it difficult to direct the air. But overall the fan - oops, the “air circulator” as Vornado calls the device - is a good small fan (sorry Vornado!).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small Compact and Powerful
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for travel, we like the noise and speed levels. It's nice and compact and fits easily into the suitcase. provides enough cooling breeze and noise for a pleasant night sleep. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Portable lil Fan
reviews.reviewText: I got this one to pack in my suitcase for air travel. Lightweight, worked well and it looks nice too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Read before buying!!
reviews.reviewText: This fan is junk and the customer support is worse. Would give 0 stars if possible.Arrived on time, looks nice, compact, but the materials and design are terrible.The first time I used it, one side of the “legs,” broke off. The third time I used it, the other side broke. Without them, it’s unusable. I’ll repeat, this is not a one off, this is a design flaw with cheap material.I reached out to the company to see if they would make it right or at least explain why this happens. Their response, well, there wasn’t one. Crickets!I’d recommend buying a different fam from a different company!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars What the h*ll is that noise??
reviews.reviewText: First off I cannot sleep without a fan, I travel for work so I really needed something that was the perfect size and powerful enough to be effective. I am using a Vernado 1303 at home and I have taken it on the road with me but I’d prefer to leave it at home for my wife. I came across this Vernado travel fan and I will say, the build quality and look is awesome. The typical noise you hear from a fan is great for the size of it and it pushes plenty of air.Now…WHAT THE H*LL IS THAT NOISE??There is a deep rumbling/vibration type sound coming from this fan that I cannot seem to isolate. Even if I hold it in my hand I can hear this sound and it’s not constant. It’s really hard to describe but I can tell you this, it’s keeping me awake and I cannot even use this fan. I know it sounds petty but my other Vernado does not have this issue. If it was more of a constant noise I could deal with it but it fluctuates and that is disturbing to sleep. I’m very disappointed as I really wanted to like this van.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel fan
reviews.reviewText: This fan is permitted on cruise ships. I have been in many cruises and the cruise line’s supply of fans is small, so always being my own. I just travelled to the desert where the temps topped out at 118. I use a fan at night as white noise and to also keep the air around me circulating. This fan is not extremely powerful, but is the perfect travel companion for drowning out your partners snoring or to provide a respite from the heat. The fan fits perfectly on a hotel nightstand and has a long enough cord to plug into the wall outlet. I am very pleased with the quality and would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena opción, tamaño compacto y buena potencia
reviews.reviewText: Se ajusto perfecto a mi necesidad

I bought this fan for my son to stay in a residence at university that did not have air conditioning. He was flying there so needed something small in his suitcase. This fan was a lifesaver. He used it every day for a whole summer, and when our central air broke down temporarily this year he pulled out his trusty fan and was the only one of us who was comfortable. For a small fan it works great, is quite and is portable. A great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Do not buy if you're in the UK
reviews.reviewText: This fan was available for sale on amazon.co.uk and it was not made clear that this fan comes with a US plug so cannot be used in the UK without a converter. If you are in the UK and are thinking about buying this fan, do not buy it as you won't be able to easily use it. I will be returning mine.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality fan especially good for travelling
reviews.reviewText: Stays in my suitcase and used when travelling

Si. Es más caro que otros ventiladores de escritorio. Pero lo vale.Trabajo en un edificio con ventanas de cristal y mi cubículo es un invernadero. Este ventilador ha hecho que la sensación térmica de medio día en el desierto se sienta como algo templado.
